_header: Man that is of woman born
_description: A translation of Job 14:1-2 in a Latin sermon — 10 lines

Longleat4.First Lines:
Man þat is of womman bornHe lyuyth but a litel
                    stounde…
Longleat4.Last Lines:
…For he is neuer mor in oon statBut alwey in
                    chaungyng
Longleat4.Editions:
Wilmott,  Adrian. 
             “Another Middle English Verse Rendering of Job 14:1-2.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 41 [239] (1994): 148.
